analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SeeleCrowdSale.doBuy (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#673-720):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(seeleToken.mint(receipient,toCollect,true)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#704)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(refund1) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#685)
	- msg.sender.transfer(refund2) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#693-694)
	- wallet.transfer(toFund) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#705)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- openSoldTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#705)

Reentrancy in SeeleCrowdSale.doBuy (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#673-720):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(seeleToken.mint(receipient,toCollect,true)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#704)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(refund1) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#685)
	- msg.sender.transfer(refund2) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#693-694)
	- wallet.transfer(toFund) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#705)
	- msg.sender.transfer(toReturn) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#711-712)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- firstStageFund (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#713-717)
	- secondStageFund (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#718-719)
SeeleCrowdSale.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

SeeleCrowdSale.SeeleCrowdSale (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#547-576) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-seeleToken.mint(minerAddress,MINER_STAKE * STAKE_MULTIPLIER,false) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#570-572)
	-seeleToken.mint(otherAddress,OTHER_STAKE * STAKE_MULTIPLIER,false) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol#573-576)

SeeleCrowdSale.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0xd4882728ca8c019a51c60abf2fdd293928380972.sol
